getBriRange

public int[] getBriRange()
Returns the brightness range.

Returns:
briRange: Brightness Range

setBriRange

public void setBriRange(int[] briRange)
Sets the brightness range to query the COLOURLovers API. This function takes a int[] array with a size of 2. The values of the integers should be in the range of 0 to 99.

Parameters:
briRange - int[]: An integer array with a size of two.

getHueRange

public int[] getHueRange()
Returns the hue range.

Returns:
hueRange: Hue Range

setHueRange

public void setHueRange(int[] hueRange)
Sets the hue range to query the COLOURLovers API. This function takes a int[] array with a size of 2. The values of the integers should be in the range of 0 to 359.

Parameters:
hueRange - int[]: An integer array with a size of two.

getSortBy

public java.lang.String getSortBy()
Returns:
sortBy

setSortBy

public void setSortBy(java.lang.String sortBy)
This function sets how the colors should be sorted. Allowed values are ASC for ascending and DESC for descending.

Parameters:
sortBy - Either ASC (ascending) or DESC (descending);
